content:
SWIFT's collaboration with R3 has been seen as a significant move by the company towards leveraging blockchain technology to enhance its services and maintain its competitiveness.

The partnership between SWIFT and R3 in 2019 aimed to integrate SWIFT gpi (global payments innovation) with R3's Corda blockchain platform, allowing Corda users to initiate and track SWIFT gpi payments directly from their platform. This integration reduces the number of intermediaries involved in cross-border transactions, resulting in faster and more cost-effective payments. 

The move demonstrates SWIFT's commitment to exploring innovative technologies and collaborating with fintech startups to expand their services and remain competitive in the financial industry.

Moreover, SWIFT's partnership with R3 has demonstrated its position as a key player in the blockchain industry. R3 is a prominent blockchain technology provider and has contributed significantly to the development of the Corda platform, which is used by various companies in the finance industry. By partnering with R3, SWIFT has been able to leverage the technological expertise of R3 and enhance its offerings to meet the evolving needs of its customers.

Overall, SWIFT's collaboration with R3 has helped the company to enhance its services and maintain its competitiveness in the financial industry. By embracing blockchain technology and working with established players in the industry such as R3, SWIFT is positioned to continue leading the way in financial messaging services.
